languages.text: Чем дальше Вольный Торговец идет по атриуму, тем неувереннее становятся {mf|его|ее} шаги. Оперевшись было о стену, Лорд-капитан вдруг оседает на пол, выкашливая на грудь сгустки крови. К Вольному Торговцу немедленно бросается несколько людей...

traits.locale_text: До терминала связи несколько метров. Вольный Торговец ускоряет шаг, но путается в собственных ногах и... БАМ! Распластывается на полу. Капитан снова заходится приступом кашля. Сплевывая кровь и сломанный зуб, {mf|он|она} пытается ползти в сторону терминала. Метр. Два. Три. А затем хватается за горло и, задыхаясь, бессильно обмякает.

languages.text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...
languages.original_text: Чем дальше Вольный Торговец идет по атриуму, тем неувереннее становятся {mf|его|ее} шаги. Оперевшись было о стену, Лорд-капитан вдруг оседает на пол, выкашливая на грудь сгустки крови. К Вольному Торговцу немедленно бросается несколько людей...

traits.locale_text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean on the wall, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

languages.text: Cuanto más se adentra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en el atrio, más temblorosos son sus pasos. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} se apoya contra una mampara y, de pronto, cae al suelo tosiendo sangre. Al momento, varias personas acuden en su ayuda...
languages.original_text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

traits.locale_text: Cuanto más se adentra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente en el atrio, más temblorosos son sus pasos. {mf|El|La} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} se apoya contra una mampara y, de pronto, cae al suelo tosiendo sangre. Al momento, varias personas acuden en su ayuda...

languages.text: 行商浪人朝着中庭走去，但脚步变得越来越不稳。{mf|他|她}靠在舱壁上，想休息一会儿，但随后就倒在了地上，大口大口地咳着血，鲜血溅到了{mf||}胸前。几名船员立刻冲到了行商浪人身边……
languages.original_text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人朝着中庭走去，但脚步变得越来越不稳。{mf|他|她}靠在舱壁上，想休息一会儿，但随后就倒在了地上，大口大口地咳着血，鲜血溅到了{mf||}胸前。几名船员立刻冲到了行商浪人身边……

languages.text: 自由開拓者がアトリウムの奥に進むにつれ、足音の響きが不安定になる。ロード・キャプテンは束の間壁にもたれかかったが、床にうずくまって自分の胸へと血の塊を吐き出した。すぐに何人かの人間が自由開拓者の側に駆け寄る…
languages.original_text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者がアトリウムの奥に進むにつれ、足音の響きが不安定になる。ロード・キャプテンは束の間壁にもたれかかったが、床にうずくまって自分の胸へと血の塊を吐き出した。すぐに何人かの人間が自由開拓者の側に駆け寄る…

languages.text: Je weiter {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} in das Atrium geht, desto unsicherer werden {mf|seine|ihre} Schritte. Der Lord Captain lehnt sich für einen Moment gegen das Schott, bricht dann aber zusammen und hustet Blut auf seine Brust. Sofort eilen mehrere Personen {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zur Seite...
languages.original_text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

languages.text: Plus {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avance dans l'atrium, plus ses pas se font chancelants. {mf|Il|Elle} s'appuie sur la cloison un instant, puis s'effondre au sol en crachant du sang sur sa poitrine. Plusieurs personnes se précipitent à son aide...
languages.original_text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

traits.locale_text: Plus {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} avance dans l'atrium, plus ses pas se font chancelants. {mf|Il|Elle} s'appuie sur la cloison un instant, puis s'effondre au sol en crachant du sang sur sa poitrine. Plusieurs personnes se précipitent à son aide...

languages.text: Hür Tacir avlunun içlerine girdikçe adımları sağlamlığı kaybediyor. Lord Kaptan bir anlığına soluklanmak için bölme paneline yaslanıyor, sonrasında ise yere çöküp göğsüne kan kusuyor. Pek çok kişi hemen Hür Tacir'in yanına koşuyor.
languages.original_text: The farther the Rogue Trader walks into the atrium, the more unsteady {mf|his|her} footsteps become. The Lord Captain takes a moment to lean against the bulkhead, but then crumples to the floor, coughing up gouts of blood onto {mf|his|her} chest. Several people immediately dash to the Rogue Trader's side...

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir avlunun içlerine girdikçe adımları sağlamlığı kaybediyor. Lord Kaptan bir anlığına soluklanmak için bölme paneline yaslanıyor ama sonra yere çöküyor ve göğsüne kan kusuyor. Pek çok kişi hemen Hür Tacir'in yanına koşuyor.
